name: Andres Leonardo
bio: A mind that isn’t fully confined within the head. Computer Engineer working at Google Developer Program. ACM, IEEE & Computer Society.

name: Israel Olalla
bio: Israel Olalla es un Customer Engineer del equipo de Google Cloud en Madrid.  Sus experiencia se ha desarrollado en el campo de los motores de búsqueda, los asistentes virtuales, los sistemas de recomendación y los juegos.  Sus intereses incluyen Tensorflow, Bigquery, Buscadores, el lenguaje GO y los interfaces conversacionales.

name: Paola García
bio: Paola Garcia. Software Engineer. Entrepreneur. Building communities in Chefly, WomenWelcome and OpenSource Weekends. Diversity Advocate in tech events.

name: Juantomás García
bio: CDO at Open Sistemas. Google Developer Expert for cloud (2017). Author the Spanish free software book 'La Pastilla Roja'. Organizer of Machine Learning Spain and GDG cloud Madrid meetups. Former President of Hispalinix (Spanish Linux Local User Group)
